DOC.brief_summary: Teeth sensitivity popular symptom use At-Home tooth whiten . Tri calcium phosphate contain paste may affect efficacy postoperative sensitivity associate At-Home vital tooth whiten use 20 % carbamide peroxide
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tri Calcium Phosphate Efficacy Sensitivity With Vital Tooth Whitening Using 20 % Carbamide Peroxide
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects enrol study apply home bleaching trays 20 % carbamide peroxide 4h/day week , sample divide two group : experimental group apply tri calcium phosphate contain paste ( Clinpro ) 30 min/day bleach treatment , control group apply placebo paste 30 min/day bleaching treatment ,
DOC.criteria: Good dental health Six maxillary anterior teeth present healthy restoration carious lesion Teeth darker Vita A2 shade No history teeth sensitivity No use desensitize agent desensitize toothpaste past three month Active caries periodontal disease Allergies bleaching agent tray material pregnancy breastfeed trial tetracyclinestained teeth fluoride nonvital teeth Smoker Using tooth bleaching product last 3 year
